document_data.name: Sourdough
document_data.mainbody: '''Sourdough''' was a type of [[bread]] from the [[Pirate Isles]],
document_data.Description:
Sourdough was made by setting aside part of a previous batch of dough to leaven the next batch. The resulting bread had a heavy consistency and a hard crust.

A loaf of sourdough could also be hollowed out and used as a bowl in feasts.
document_data.History: Sourdough bread originated in the Pirate Isles but rapidly gained popularity in the [[Sword Coast]] and the [[Western Heartlands]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Breaking Umberlee's Resolve|6-7}}
